attributes.action: An additional 5 days of holiday for all the NHS staff and the key workers.
attributes.additional_details: NHS Is working really hard to keep us alive. When the dark days are over, every key worker will deserve a short break from everyday struggle to keep us safe and keep this country on its feet.
attributes.background: I would like the government to consider rewarding all the key workers who work really hard to keep this country going. NHS and everyone else who need to risk by going to work everyday.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308903

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
